item.title: Type School Diary
item.description: #TypeSchool by @3type_cn - DAY ONE - wrote some calligraphy, watched some Hamilton [sic], traced some roman letters, wasted some food. - DAY TWO - quick type sketches, critiques, fake Japanese food, then we hugged good bye to adorkable Toshi. - DAY THREE - more calligraphy, more quick sketches, more type knowledge, getting more serious ü§î - DAY FOUR - latin is not enough. - DAY FIVE - starting to draw sketches for the final assignment.
